gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 123, Hornets 98
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Hornets, 123-98. Keegan Murray recorded 25 points, six rebounds, and three assists for the Kings, with Domantas Sabonis adding 24 points, 10 rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 24 points, seven rebounds, and six assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Kings improve to 23-14 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 8-27.
